segments.text: Mom , look ! My first piggy bank and it still has money in it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a blast from the past .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember when I used to beg you to break it so I could go buy ice cream ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You sure have come a long way in valuing your hard earned dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for not giving in to my childhood tantrums , mom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But what are you going to do with that pig ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I'm going to keep it as a monument to what I've learned about money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who knows , maybe one day he will sit on the desk of a top CEO in a major corporation !
segments.speaker: S2
